definition: not of the highest quality or sophistication, hair growing in the pubic area, to provide with a bushing
details:
adjective
- not of the highest quality or sophistication
= synonyms: bush-league
noun
- hair growing in the pubic area
= synonyms: pubic hair, crotch hair
- dense vegetation consisting of stunted trees or bushes
= synonyms: scrub
- a large wilderness area
- a low woody perennial plant usually having several major stems
= synonyms: shrub
verb
- to provide with a bushing
= example: to provide with a bushing
